column2: Okay, so let's keep working on some more Power-ups. Are you with me?
Totally!
Let's go to Lightspeed again.
You know the drill: Desktop. Lightspeed icon. Click.

Now that we've spawned a Power-up, let's see what special powers they can give us!

For the first Power-up, let's imagine what we could do if nothing could harm the ship. Let's try it!

We'll make the ship invulnerable for five seconds. Flip to the code panel.
Press the Flip button.

Click on the Power-Up tab, at the bottom. See that `activatePowerup()` function? 

That will get executed when we pick up the Power-up.

Right now it's empty, so it does nothing. Let's make the ship invulnerable there.

There's a variable called `ship.invulnerableTimer`. Set it to 5 seconds. This is a bit tricky. 

It's totally okay to ask for a hint if you're not sure how to do this!
Beneath `if (powerUpType == 'invulnerable') {`, type in `ship.invulnerableTimer = 5;`
Now start the level as usual.
Let's see if that worked. Try picking up a Power-up when you see it.
Go ahead and play the level now.
Press the *Restart* button.
Uh oh. The ship crashed while we were waiting for a Power-up to be spawned!
Let's give it another try. Coding is all about trying something and seeing how it plays out!
Press the *Restart* button.
That's it. You're invulnerable now! That means if your ship crashes into something, it will survive!
Hmm. Odd. You picked up the Power-up but didn't get any special powers. Go back to check.
Nothing picked. Are the Power-ups actually being spawned? Go back to check.
I see. You spawned a Power-up, but not the kind you wanted. Spawn the `'invulnerable'` Power-up.
Okay, so go ahead and finish the level now.
Excellent! Those Power-ups definitely open up new possibilities!
No prob. Hope you'll check back later.
